sentences.en: A beautiful, voluptuous woman goes to a gynecologist.
sentences.cn: 一个妖艳的美吕去看妇科医生。

sentences.en: Anu returned to her gynecologist and aborted the fetus.
sentences.cn: 阿奴回到妇科医生那里打掉了胎儿。

sentences.en: Now, 20 years later, she still used him as her gynecologist.
sentences.cn: 现在，20年过去了，她还是一直找他作为她的妇科医生。
